body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is Jason Murphy and I'm from CarFix Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Melissa Martin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Melissa. Could you please provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five eight two nine one six four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Melissa. Additionally, could you share your email address with us for further communication?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is melissa.martin@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for providing that information. We will use it to assist you better. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having some issues with the customer service at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Melissa. We will do our best to resolve your concerns. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Melissa. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!
